name: The Wizard Ran 1
description:
Next chapter: December 7th

The first chapter in the TWR mystery series! New chapters released every week, on Wednesdays! Each chapter will feature multiple endings. Use your innate videogame logic to solve the puzzles ahead. Try dumbass things. Break the world. Then run away.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact
  • Use the mouse for some actions

Special thanks:

  • TanukiWish, for drawing the character sprites in this chapter and playtesting a lot.
